title: KVASU Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for Pharmacist Posts
description: The Kerala Veterinary and Animal Sciences University (KVASU) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Pharmacist Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their D. Pharm can apply for the KVASU Notification 2026 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, a...
